ygData.subject: Re: Lab 5 (Malice/Wolfblade)
ygData.msgSnippet: Malice nervously chuckled as he released his hold on her waist, and supports her by the shoulders.  He struggled to find an excuse, but his tongue was tied in

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice nervously chuckled as he released his hold on her waist, and supports her by the shoulders.  He struggled to find an excuse, but his tongue was tied in an amazing series of knots.  He just shut up and walked Wolfblade into the lab and to a chair.  He walked to the sphere, and turned, still nerivous and trying to sort out the previous moment's events.
"Let's finish this thing, ok?"
He looked at his partner, his nerviousness showing well, he was wanting a disraction, but, at the same time, felt something else.

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:
Wolfblade::

She found herself being held up by a male bot and wasn't sure what to 
do. She had her hands on his chest as she looked up at him. "Ah, I, 
uh, erhm, eh, well, this isn't what I was expecting. Eh, I mean, this 
isn't what I wanted. No, No, I mean, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to, 
uh..."  She couldn't believe her predicament. She found herself 
actually blushing as she couldn't manage to ingage her audiable 
functions. She started to feel scared that her mother boards were 
melting or something. 




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice almost instinctivly reacted.  He quickly stepped forward, 
and his arms instantly wrapped around Wolfblade's waist.  He stood up 
straight, Wolfblade in his arms against his chest.  He didn't speak, 
how could he?  He wasn't sure what just happened himself.
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:Wolfblade::
> 
> She put her arm on his shoulder and used him to balance.  She 
> appreciated his help in waliking while her systems returned to 
normal 
> functioning perameters. "You were guessing? Look Malice, we both 
know 
> that you very, very good at what you do. So I'm not buying the 'I'm 
> just guessing' bit. Anyway, as far as taking it easy, we have still 
> have to deal with Unicrom when he gets closer. So let's get to the 
> lab and make sure our little invention works."  She took a step and 
> her legs buckled under her. She started to fall. "ACK!"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice was suprised.  He expected her to slug him in the face.  
He 
> stood for a moment, not moving.  
> > <What was that?  Why did she do that?  I expected he to try to 
kill 
> me.>
> > Malice pushed it aside, but it was still there, nagging the back 
of 
> his mind.  He walked over to Wolfblade and helped her to her feet.  
> Although she was recovering, she still had trouble standing.  He 
> gently held her upright, so he could look her in the optics.
> > "You should take it easy.  I was guessing at what I was doing.  
So 
> take it easy, ok?"  
> > 
> > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > Wofblade::
> > 
> > She had to endure hit taunting but she didn't have to like it. 
> While 
> > he moved her back and forth, she could feel her hands coming back 
> on 
> > line. She growled but played as thought she couldn't even move 
her 
> > optics if she wanted to. "You know, your good. Your very good. 
> > However, you don't have to rub it in."  She frowned a bit and 
> wished 
> > her body would recover faster. She grumbled, "Great, and if I was 
> > around when you and your brother were together, who knows if I'd 
> > still be functioning or not. i don't think I'd survive. Not the 
way 
> > you mix drinks."  She kept swaying as he moved her back and 
forth. 
> > She felt her legs come on line. She she waited just a second to 
run 
> a 
> > quick internal diognostic. She was about 50 %.  She decided to 
use 
> > what she had. She stood up as quickly as possible. She turned and 
> > leaned on the back of the chair. She kissed Malice on the nose 
and 
> > then walked/hobbled/limped out towards the mess hall door. "You 
too 
> > can learn a few things Oh great Sarcastic One." as she walked out 
> > into the hallway.  She stopped just outside the door and leaned 
> > against the wall. "Sheesh, note to self, don't drink with that 
bot 
> > again," under her breath. 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Malice began to chuckle softly.  Then it got louder, and loude, 
> > until it sounded a lot like Megatron, the Leader of the 
> Decepticons.  
> > One could easily confuse Malice for Megatron.  
> > >  
> > > He had to admit, she played her act extremly well.
> > > "Oh you don't mean that, now do you?  You're just mad I caught 
on 
> > to you so quickly.  At least I didn't throw you into stasis lock 
> and 
> > do something bad to you."
> > > He let loose another manical laugh, before stepping out from 
> behind 
> > the counter.  He stood behind Wolfblade, taking her shoulders in 
> his 
> > big hands and gently tossed her back and forth in between his 
> hands.  
> > > "Your a good Maximal or Maxitron or whatever, too bad you were 
> not 
> > online when me and my brother came online.  You'd be a real 
riot!   
> > Oh well, live and learn.  Well at least you should learned a 
lesson 
> > from this."
> > > 
> > > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC: Sorry I haven't posted lately. Just got out of the 
hospital. 
> > But 
> > > I'm feeling much better now. 
> > > 
> > > IC:
> > > Wolfblade:
> > > She took the drink and downed it. She didn't budge. Didn't even 
> > > twitch. However, she couldn't move to save her life. She smiled 
> > > slightly and looked at him. He was spiking her drinks and she 
was 
> > > just now realizing it. She was mad at him for now her motor 
> skills 
> > > went into stasis for a  bit. She took a deep breath and looked 
at 
> > > him. "Malice, I like you. You are a good comrad in arms. 
However, 
> > you 
> > > ever...and I mean EVER do that again, and once I can move again 
> > I'll 
> > > terminate your programs perminantely." She couldn't help but 
> > chuckle. 
> > > He got the better side of her and she was more frustrated at 
> > herself 
> > > for letting her guard down.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > "I am Des Wraith, the Archfiend of Flames.  I have slaughtered 
> > thousands of demons who opposed me and will keep doing so.  And 
not 
> > even the great King of All Demons can stop my awesome wrath!"
